metadata.title: CVE-2016-2457 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: server/pm/UserManagerService.java in Wi-Fi in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2,5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-05-01 allows attackers to bypassintended restrictions on Wi-Fi configuration changes by leveraging guestaccess, aka internal bug 27411179.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
